entity.name: scanjob
entity.query: SELECT sj.id jobid, sj.status jobstatus, sj.modified scanjobmodified, sjl.name reviser, sjl.id reviserid, e.id entryid, scannable.stype stype, scannable.modified scannablemodified, scannable.signature signature, scannable.title title, scannable.pageStart pagestart, scannable.pageEnd pageend, rc.id collectionid, rc.rcnumberid collectionnumber, rcl.name locationname, rcl.id locationid FROM scan_job sj LEFT JOIN (SELECT sjbc.bookchapterid AS scannableid, sjbc.scanjobid AS scanjobid FROM scan_job_book_chapter sjbc UNION SELECT sjja.journalarticleid AS scannableid, sjja.scanjobid AS scanjobid FROM scan_job_journal_article sjja) AS scannable_job ON sj.id = scannable_job.scanjobid LEFT JOIN (SELECT ja.id AS id, 'JournalArticle' AS stype, ja.signature AS signature, ja.journaltitle AS title, ja.pageStart AS pagestart, ja.pageEnd AS pageend, ja.modified AS modified FROM journal_article ja UNION SELECT bc.id AS id, 'BookChapter' AS stype, bc.signature AS signature, bc.booktitle AS title, bc.pageStart AS pagestart, bc.pageEnd AS pageend, bc.modified AS modified FROM book_chapter bc) AS scannable ON scannable_job.scannableid = scannable.id LEFT JOIN entry e ON scannable.id = e.id LEFT JOIN reserve_collection rc ON rc.id = e.reservecollectionid LEFT JOIN library_location rcl ON rc.librarylocationid = rcl.id LEFT JOIN library_location sjl ON sj.locationid = sjl.id WHERE e.deleted IS NULL
